page.title: 17LEISURE
page.content: There are many leisure pursuits in our area for all ages.They include:- Youth Club,Chess Club,Derby and Joan, Tennis,Popmobility,Cubs,Scouts, Brownies and Guides. {Play Group.}This is held on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday.Children start at 3 yrs until they go to school.About 30 children attend regularly with 3 mums running it.By law they must keep a register.It costs 80p per morning from 9.30 till noon.The children do activities like jigsaws,shapes, playdo,dressing up and playing in the sand.They also have a guinea pig.At 11.00 they have a drink and biscuits. Sometimes they go out on picnics and other trips. {Sunday School.}This is held in the old school. They have a service and then work in groups. There are 5 helpers. {
